user_data:
#!/bin/bash

# Initial boot script to bootstrap fedora vm's with an IMP agent
# disable the firewall and selinux
setenforce 0
service firewalld stop

# install the imp repo
cat > /etc/yum.repos.d/imp.repo <<EOF
[imp]
name="IMP repository"
baseurl=http://people.cs.kuleuven.be/~bart.vanbrabant/imp
enabled=1
gpgcheck=0
EOF

# install IMP agent
yum install -y python-imp

# configure the agent
cat > /etc/imp/agent.cfg <<EOF
[config]
loglevel = INFO
server = http://mgmt-master.dreamaas.cs.kuleuven.be:8888

[communication]
host = mq-master.dreamaas.cs.kuleuven.be
user = guest
password = guest
exchange = imp

[agent]
pid-file = /run/imp/agent.pid
logfile = /var/log/imp/agent.log
hostnames = master-0.dnetcloud.dreamaas.cs.kuleuven.be
code_dir = /var/lib/imp
EOF

# configure dns
cat > /etc/resolv.conf <<EOF
nameserver 8.8.8.8
EOF

# start supervisord
systemctl start imp-agent
name: master-0.dnetcloud.dreamaas.cs.kuleuven.be
